questions.question: Which of the following best describes primary storage?
options: A storage area used exclusively for backups and archives
A type of storage that is directly accessed by the CPU through a direct connection
A storage device used for long-term retention of files only
A storage medium accessed through the internet only
questions.answer: A type of storage that is directly accessed by the CPU through a direct connection

questions.question: ______ is a volatile type of storage that loses its contents when the power is turned off.
Match each memory type with its main characteristic.

pairs.SRAM: Uses flip flops, no refreshing, faster

questions.question: The speed of a computer increases with larger __________ because it reduces access to slower secondary storage.
Data and instructions from secondary storage must first be transferred into ______ before they are processed by the CPU.
Which of the following is true about secondary storage?
options: It is volatile and stores temporary data
It is accessed directly by the CPU
It stores larger amounts of data than primary storage and retains data without power
It only stores programs currently in use
questions.answer: It stores larger amounts of data than primary storage and retains data without power

questions.question: Which of the following statements about solid state drives (SSDs) and hard disk drives (HDDs) is correct?
options: SSDs have unlimited write endurance and higher rotational latency than HDDs
SSDs are faster and more reliable, but have limited write endurance
HDDs are faster and more reliable, but have limited write endurance
HDDs consume less power and have no moving parts
questions.answer: SSDs are faster and more reliable, but have limited write endurance

questions.question: What causes latency in hard disk drives?
options: The delay while data is read or written using lasers
The delay caused by moving platters rotating the needed data under the read/write head
The time taken to erase data before rewriting
Data fragmentation increasing write endurance
questions.answer: The delay caused by moving platters rotating the needed data under the read/write head

questions.question: Match each solid state storage component with its function.

pairs.Cell: Basic storage unit in a transistor grid

questions.question: Match each storage type with its characteristic.

pairs.Magnetic storage: Uses magnetism to store data on spinning platters
pairs.Optical storage: Uses laser light to read and write data on discs, with pits and lands
pairs.Solid state storage: Has no moving parts and uses semiconductor chips

questions.question: What is a key disadvantage of SSDs compared to HDDs?
options: Higher power consumption
Limited write endurance
Slower access speeds
Larger physical size

questions.question: Virtual memory is created when:
options: The CPU cache is expanded
A portion of the hard disk or SSD is used as an extension of RAM
The BIOS loads before the OS
The ROM stores temporary program data
questions.answer: A portion of the hard disk or SSD is used as an extension of RAM

questions.question: In virtual memory, data not immediately needed in RAM is moved in units called ______.
Which of the following is a drawback of using hard disk based virtual memory?
options: Increased processing speed
Disk thrashing due to frequent swapping
Reduced ability to run large programs
No need for RAM
questions.answer: Disk thrashing due to frequent swapping

questions.question: Cloud storage stores data on remote ______ and comes in three main types: public cloud, private cloud, and ______.
Which is an advantage of cloud storage?
options: Access without internet connection
No ongoing costs for storage
Ability to scale storage space easily
Full control over data security by the user
questions.answer: Ability to scale storage space easily

questions.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage of cloud storage?
options: Dependence on internet speed and stability
No possible security risks
Requires buying and maintaining physical hardware
Cannot be scaled to meet demand
questions.answer: Dependence on internet speed and stability

questions.question: A __________ cloud is a dedicated storage environment within a company’s infrastructure.
Match the storage type to its characteristic.

pairs.Local storage: Full user control over security; Fixed hardware capacity

questions.question: A disadvantage of local storage compared to cloud storage is the cost of buying and maintaining ______.
